truth: -  "Radiology is a medical specialty that uses imaging to diagnose and treat diseases within the body."
fiction: -  "Radiology is a culinary specialty that uses imaging to identify and enhance flavors within food."

truth: -  "Computed Tomography (CT) scans use X-rays to create detailed images of the body."
fiction: -  "Computed Tomography (CT) scans use X-ray vision superpowers to create detailed images of the body."

truth: -  "Ultrasound imaging uses high-frequency sound waves to produce images of the inside of the body."
fiction: -  "Ultrasound imaging uses high-frequency bird calls to produce images of the inside of the body."

truth: -  "Radiologists are medical doctors who specialize in diagnosing and treating injuries and diseases using medical imaging."
fiction: -  "Radiologists are mystical shamans who specialize in diagnosing and treating injuries and diseases using crystal ball imaging."

truth: -  "Mammography is a specific type of imaging that uses a low-dose x-ray system for examination of the breasts."
fiction: -  "Mammography is a specific type of imaging that uses a low-dose x-ray system for examination of the soul."

truth: -  "Interventional radiology is a subspecialty of radiology which provides minimally invasive diagnosis and/or treatment using imaging guidance."
fiction: -  "Interventional radiology is a subspecialty of radiology which provides minimally invasive mind reading and/or fortune telling using imaging guidance."

truth: -  "Nuclear medicine uses small amounts of radioactive materials to diagnose and treat a variety of diseases."
fiction: -  "Nuclear medicine uses small amounts of radioactive materials to give patients superpowers."

truth: -  "Radiation therapy uses high-energy radiation to shrink tumors and kill cancer cells."
fiction: -  "Radiation therapy uses high-energy radiation to shrink humans and create miniaturized versions of them."

truth: -  "Fluoroscopy is a type of medical imaging that shows a continuous X-ray image on a monitor."
fiction: -  "Fluoroscopy is a type of medical imaging that shows a continuous X-ray image on the moon."

truth: -  "Positron Emission Tomography (PET) scans help to measure important body functions such as blood flow, oxygen use, and sugar (glucose) metabolism."
fiction: -  "Positron Emission Tomography (PET) scans help to measure important body functions such as telepathic abilities, aura strength, and chakra alignment."

truth: -  "Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) uses a magnetic field and radio waves to create detailed images of the organs and tissues within the body."
fiction: -  "Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) uses a magnetic field and radio waves to create detailed images of the past and future events within a person's life."

truth: -  "Radiologists use a variety of imaging techniques such as X-rays, ultrasound, and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) to diagnose or treat diseases."
fiction: -  "Radiologists use a variety of imaging techniques such as X-rays, ultrasound, and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) to communicate with extraterrestrial life."

truth: -  "Radiology can be used to guide doctors during surgery."
fiction: -  "Radiology can be used to guide lost travelers during their journeys."

truth: -  "X-rays are a type of radiation called electromagnetic waves, which create pictures of the inside of your body."
fiction: -  "X-rays are a type of radiation called electromagnetic waves, which create pictures of your thoughts and dreams."

truth: -  "A radiologist can use a CT scan to see bones, muscles, fat, and organs with great detail."
fiction: -  "A radiologist can use a CT scan to see the invisible realm of spirits and ghosts with great detail."

truth: -  "Radiology technologists are trained professionals who perform imaging examinations."
fiction: -  "Radiology technologists are trained professionals who perform magic spells."

truth: -  "Radiology can be used to diagnose conditions in the chest, bone, and abdomen."
fiction: -  "Radiology can be used to diagnose conditions in the aura, chakras, and spiritual energy."

truth: -  "Radiation used in medical imaging can have side effects and should be used judiciously."
fiction: -  "Radiation used in medical imaging can grant superpowers and should be used liberally."

truth: -  "Radiology plays a key role in the detection of early-stage cancers."
fiction: -  "Radiology plays a key role in the detection of early-stage psychic abilities."

truth: -  "Radiologists often work in collaboration with other specialists to provide comprehensive patient care."
fiction: -  "Radiologists often work in collaboration with wizards and sorcerers to provide comprehensive magical care."
